title: Bocchi-sensei! Teach me Scanlation!
description:
Guide for people who want to learn scanlation.

Will be expanded slowly... These are effort :/

Feel free to add your own guides if you have a different way of doing something.

[url=https://mangadex.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Bocchi-Sensei%20Actions.atn]Actions[/url] Just drop it into Photoshop to add them to it.
[url=https://mangadex.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Topaz%20Clean]Topaz Plug-in[/url] Add .zip to end after you download it.
[url=https://mangadex.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Keyboard%20Shortcuts%20Primary.psp]Keyboard shortcuts[/url] Needs to be placed in \Users\YourName\AppData\Roaming\Adobe\Adobe Photoshop CC 2018\Adobe Photoshop CC 2018 Settings\ folder for it to work.

related.title: Ero-Otoko's Guide to Translating and Editing
